alert.note: Alert for Greater Oconee; Oconee Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Stephens, east central Habersham, south central Rabun and west central Oconee Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 403 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Toccoa, or near Tallulah Gorge State Park, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toccoa, Tallulah Falls and Tallulah Gorge State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
